revised_title: Search for New Gases in the Inactive Series
tldr: The author investigates the possibility of discovering new gases in the inactive series with atomic weight higher than xenon. After examining the heavier portions of gas remaining after fractional distillation of 120 tons of air, no positive results were found. It is concluded that if such gases exist, they must be found in the atmosphere, and they are either unstable or do not exist at all.
